transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hanji namaskar.
Customer: Namaste Deepak sir good morning.
Executive: Good morning. India Mart se Raju Prajapati bol raha tha.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Sir main check kar raha tha calls vagerah increase hue hain kuch.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Aapke bahar ke call increase hue hain notice kiya aapne?
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Bahar calls matlab?
Customer: Haan business nahi hai business nahi hai.
Executive: Business nahi hai matlab sab inquiry calls hai?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Aur sare locals the ya bahar ke the?
Customer: Do teen bahar ke ek do teen local the.
Executive: Latest wale jo hai sab local hai na jo November mein aayi hai mere khyal se.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: To agar kahin se bhi business milega to main aapko inform karta hun theek hai na.
Customer: Achcha theek hai.
Executive: Phone se phone se theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states no business from buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive will inform if business is found.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, business, inquiry, calls
